sourceMeaningMnemonic: Sometimes <radical>life</radical> gives you a <radical>kick</radical>, and you have to <kanji>express</kanji> yourself to deal with it!
meaningInfo: Think of the last time life gave you a kick, and how you expressed that pain to make it go away.
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>express</kanji> yourself, so you call up a friend and say “Heyo!” (<ja>ひょう</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine yourself saying it more like <ja>ひょう</ja>, though, so your friend has to try to figure out what you're saying.
